summary: VEHICLE HAS 34,900 MILES AND NOW EXPERIENCING A POWERTRAIN WARNING LIGHT AFTER DRIVING AT 55 MPH FOR 8 MILES. VEHICLE IS 'MISSING' AND LOOSED POWER DOWN TO 35-40 MPH.  PULLED OFF AND TURNED OFF ENGINE AND THE LIGHT STAYED OFF FOR ONE DAY AND CAME BACK ON AND LOST POWER AGAIN AFTER ABOUT THE SAME DISTANCE ON HIGHWAY.  AFRAID TO DRIVE ON HIGHWAY.  TRYING TO GET TO THE DEALER.
